alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 2:22PM MST until February 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, Flat Tops, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Grand and Battlement Mesas. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Southwest San Juan Mountains; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
